text: Mircea Mureșan (11 November 1928 - 24 April 2020) was a Romanian movie director. He directed 22 movies, beginning in 1961. Mureșan won the prize for Best First Work at the 1966 Cannes Film Festival for the movie Răscoala. He also directed Blestemul pământului, blestemul iubirii and Toate pînzele sus. Mureșan died on 24 April 2020 in Râmnicu Vâlcea, Romania at the age of 91.A murit regizorul Mircea Mureşan, rămas definitiv în memoria cinefililor datorită serialului „Toate pânzele sus“ ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Romanian movie directors
title: Mircea Mureșan
